name: Flatwood Drop-Outs
description:
Flatwood Drop-Outs is a gay, furry visual novel that I've been working on for a while about you - the protagonist - being stuck in a small cabin with a bunch of strangers with nowhere to go, almost nothing to eat and nothing to do but try and survive the end of the world. Although it's still in development, and will be for a while, I'm uploading in the hopes that someone will find joy and intrigue by it.

All the art, music and writing is done by me - so that explains why it's all pretty crap. But I tried! I hope my deer boi Cooper is enough to convince you to hop on board the Flatwood train and see what happens to all these doomed little souls!

THIS GAME FEATURES EXPLICIT CONTENT AND FOCUSES ON THEMES SUCH AS MENTAL HEALTH AND SUICIDE. PLEASE DON'T PLAY THIS GAME IF YOU DO NOT WISH TO BE EXPOSED TO THIS FORM OF CONTENT.
